Autobiography

Xurshid Xolmirzayev Behzod o'g'li

My full name is Khurshid Kholmirzayev. I am 17 years old. I am a student of PDP University. I am a beginner developer now. My hobbies are playing football, table tennis and hanging out with my friends.

Yesterday is a history, tomorrow is a mystery and today is a gift!
